data.comment: Today's referee, Yuichi Nishimura, has blown to start the match.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 6, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 8, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima drive upfield and Ayase Ueda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Urawa defender.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 10, Kashima's Tomoya Inukai gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Urawa defender.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Shuto Yamamoto (Kashima) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 10, Urawa have a goal kick.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Everaldo with an assist there.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Kashima surge into the attack at Kashima Soccer Stadium but Ayase Uedaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Leonardo (Urawa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda misses with an attempt on goal.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Kashima's half.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kashima.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 23, Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Urawa's Leonardo has run offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Kashima.
In the minute 27, Urawa's Ryosuke Yamanaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 31, Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kashima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, Juan Alano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 35, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Kazuki Nagasawa for Urawa has been booked by Yuichi Nishimura and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Urawa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 39, In Kashima, Everaldo of Kashima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kashima are pushing forward but Everaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Important block from the Urawa defence as Juan Alano fires in a strike for Kashima.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 41, At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Leonardo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick Urawa.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Shinzo Koroki (Urawa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Quenten Martinus hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Kashima for Urawa.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Throw-in for Urawa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Kashima.
In Kashima Kashima drive forward through Juan Alano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Kashima push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Everaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Urawa defence.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 47, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
In Kashima, Quenten Martinus of Urawa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Urawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Goal! Ayase Ueda extends Kashima's lead to 2-0.
Juan Alano instrumental with a fine assist.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Urawa's area.
In the minute 52, Kashima drives forward and Everaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 55, Kashima are coming forward and Leo Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
The away team replace Koya Yuruki with Yuki Muto.
Urawa make their second substitution with Ewerton replacing Kazuki Nagasawa.
In the minute 58, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Urawa's half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Leonardo of Urawa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 62, Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Juan Alano for the home team is judged to be offside.
Goal! Kashima extend their lead to 3-0 through Everaldo.
Great play from Juan Alano to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Ryotaro Ito is replacing Takuya Aoki for the away team.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kashima.
Free kick Urawa.
Ryotaro Ito for Urawa drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 71, Quenten Martinus of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Yasushi Endo is replacing Ayase Ueda for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In Kashima Kashima attack through Yasushi Endo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Yuichi Nishimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Urawa are pushing forward but Ryotaro Ito's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kenyu Sugimoto is on a sub for Shinzo Koroki for Urawa.
In the minute 78, Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a fifth substitution, with Tomoya Ugajin replacing Quenten Martinus.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Great finish from Leo Silva to give Kashima a 4-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Shoma Doi.
In the minute 83, Zago (Kashima) is making a fifth substitution, with Sho Ito replacing Everaldo.
The home team have replaced Shoma Doi with Yuta Matsumura. This is the second substitution made today by Zago.
Zago is making the team's third substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Ryota Nagaki replacing Juan Alano.
In the minute 83, Rikuto Hirose is replacing Kei Koizumi for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Yuta Matsumura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
In the minute 89, Kenyu Sugimoto for Urawa drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Kashima.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ryosuke Yamanaka (Urawa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Kashima.
In Kashima Kashima drive forward through Tomoya Inukai. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima are whistled for offside.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Urawa's Ewerton misses with an attempt on goal.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
Ryosuke Yamanaka is booked for the away team.
